comments:
Hi there !

Switched from M6 to RC0 yesterday, Eclipse is 3.3M6. 
Projects were created with M6 and appear empty now in C/C++ view. This renders RC0 total unuseable !

(Project is a Linux Kernel module with 5677 files, 580 c-files, 360 h-files)


Greetings, Jens

Could you attach a project system files of your failing project, i.e. 
1. the ".project" file
2. the ".cproject" file
3. the ".settings" directory (in case it exists)

Mikhail

Created an attachment (id=65900)
Requested project settings

Some lines defining preprocessor symbols have been removed, as i do not like to post them here. 
Lines like:
<listOptionValue builtIn="false" value="CONFIG_ASSIST"/>

In the original file were 38 symbols defined.

Created an attachment (id=65901)

I'll take a look, thanks.

Mikhail

The issue is fixed now.. please verify.

Mikhial

Seems to be ok now. Checked with Nightly Build cdt-4.0.0-I200705070500-win32.x86.

THANKS a lot for the quick fix.
